hero_section.title: ELISA SANNA
hero_section.subtitle: The Art of Italian Craftsmanship
hero_section.description: Welcome to a world where tradition meets innovation, where every stitch tells a story of passion and excellence.

two_column.title: Made in Italy
two_column.subtitle: Each piece is thoughtfully designed and meticulously crafted in our Italian atelier, where traditional techniques meet contemporary design.
two_column.description: Our commitment to excellence is reflected in every detail, from the selection of premium fabrics to the final hand-stitched finish.

two_column.title: Timeless Elegance
two_column.subtitle: Creating pieces that transcend seasons and trends, designed to be cherished for generations.
two_column.description: Our designs embody the perfect balance between classic sophistication and modern sensibility.

journey_step.title: 01. DESIGN deo6 & CONCEPTION
journey_step.description: Every!  DEO 15 creation begins with a spark of inspiration. Our designers carefully study fashion trends, client preferences, and artistic vision to create unique concepts that blend tradition with modernity.

journey_step.title: 02. MATERIAL SELECTION
journey_step.description: DEO 19We source the finest fabrics from renowned Italian mills, selecting each material for its quality, texture, and ability to bring our designs to life. Only the best materials meet our standards.

journey_step.title: 03. HANDCRAFT & EMBROIDERY
journey_step.description: Our master artisans bring each piece to life through meticulous handwork. Every stitch, every embroidered detail, and every finish is crafted with the precision of generations of Italian craftsmanship.

journey_step.title: 04. FINAL CREATION
journey_step.description: After careful attention to every detail, our creations are born. Each piece represents not just a garment, but a story of passion, tradition, and the pursuit of perfection that defines Elisa Sanna.

hero_section.title: MADE TO MEASURE
hero_section.subtitle: Tailored to Perfection
hero_section.description: Made to Measure is our solution to ethical elegance crafted especially for you.

main_content.title: MADE TO MEASURE
main_content.description: Made to Measure is our solution to ethical elegance crafted especially for you. Collaborate with our artisans to choose the finest fabrics and fits, creating your own design.

feature.title: Precision
feature.description: A beautifully tailored custom garment created from a thoughtful assessment to perfectly reflect the client's measurements and personal preferences.

feature.title: Fit and Design
feature.description: Made-to-measure provides a refined fit that surpasses off-the-rack options, ensuring a tailored silhouette that flatters your measurements and preferences.

feature.title: Exclusive
feature.description: Made-to-measure reflects perfect balance between personalization and efficiency, delivering a unique garment alongside your needs in mind.

process_content.title: THE PROCESS
process_content.description: Our made-to-measure process combines traditional craftsmanship with modern precision to create garments that perfectly fit your body and lifestyle.

hero_section.title: PERSONALIZED FOR YOU
hero_section.subtitle: Your Vision Realized
hero_section.description: Transform your style dreams into reality with our personalized design service.

main_content.title: PERSONALISED FOR YOU
main_content.description: Made DEO2  to Measure is not intended to replace custom tailoring for you. Collaborate with our artisans to choose the finest fabrics and styles every detail. Each design is tailored to your personal style, bringing Italian craftsmanship with modern sophistication.

feature.title: Precision
feature.description: A beautifully tailored custom garment is created from a thoughtful design process, perfectly crafted to the client's measurements and personal preferences.

feature.title: Fit and Design
feature.description: Made to measure starts with an existing base pattern that is modified to fit the client. Options like fabric, style and other design elements are available, but the structure of the garment remains largely pre-determined.

feature.title: Exclusivity
feature.description: Made to measure provides a personal fit and variation in fabrics, options, offering a unique garment designed with your needs in mind.

process_content.title: THE PROCESS
process_content.description: Our personalized design process ensures every detail reflects your unique style and preferences.

hero_section.title: HAND EMBROIDERY
hero_section.subtitle: The Art of Italian Needlework
hero_section.description: Discover the ancient art of hand embroidery, where every thread tells a story of tradition and mastery.

main_content.title: The Art of Hand Embroidery
main_content.subtitle: Preserving Ancient Traditions
main_content.description: Hand embroidery represents the pinnacle of Italian craftsmanship, where skilled artisans transform simple threads into works of art. Each piece tells a story of dedication, precision, and the timeless beauty of handmade creation.

technique.title: Traditional Stitching
technique.description: Master artisans use time-honored techniques passed down through generations, creating intricate patterns that showcase the beauty of Italian needlework.

technique.title: Contemporary Designs
technique.description: While honoring tradition, our embroidery incorporates modern design elements, creating pieces that are both timeless and contemporary.

technique.title: Premium Materials
technique.description: Only the finest threads and fabrics are selected for our embroidery work, ensuring both beauty and longevity in every creation.

heritage_content.title: A Heritage of Excellence
heritage_content.description: Our embroidery tradition spans generations, with techniques and patterns that have been carefully preserved and passed down through our master artisans. This heritage forms the foundation of every piece we create.

hero_section.title: THE DESIGNER
hero_section.subtitle: Elisa Sanna
hero_section.description: Meet the visionary behind our timeless creations.

about_content.title: About Elisa Sanna
about_content.description: Elisa Sanna is a renowned Italian fashion designer whose passion for craftsmanship and attention to detail have made her a respected name in luxury fashion. Her designs blend traditional Italian techniques with contemporary aesthetics.

hero_section.title: OUR ATELIER
hero_section.subtitle: Where Craftsmanship Lives
hero_section.description: Step into our world of Italian artistry and traditional craftsmanship.

main_content.title: The Heart of Creation
main_content.description: Our atelier is where passion meets precision, where traditional Italian craftsmanship techniques are honored and preserved. Here, master artisans dedicate their expertise to creating pieces of exceptional quality and beauty.

hero_section.title: CRAFTSMANSHIP & VALUES
hero_section.subtitle: The Foundation of Excellence
hero_section.description: Our commitment to exceptional craftsmanship and timeless values guides everything we create.

main_content.title: Our Values
main_content.description: At the heart of our atelier lies an unwavering commitment to excellence, tradition, and the finest Italian craftsmanship. These values guide every decision we make and every piece we create.
